title: Onde Series
description: All pieces of the Onde series are bespoke. Dimensions, wood types and finishes can be modified, we are happy to discuss what will best suit your space.

All pieces of the Onde series are bespoke. Dimensions, wood types and finishes can be modified, we are happy to discuss what will best suit your space. Available in oak, maple and ash. Oil finished.
